name: Commercial Large 12 Trays Food Dehydrator, Usable Area up to 22.67ft², 1200W Full Stainless Steel Dryer Machine, up to 190℉ Temperature, for Meat, Fruit, Beef, Herbs, and Pet Food
about_this_item: [Commercial Design Large Capacity]:Commercial design is especially suitable for businesses or households with a large amount of food to be made.Includes large size 12 drying trays,each tray is 15.75* 15.75 inches. 1 drip tray, 6 silicone pads, 1 non-stick sheet, 1 hanger, 12 hooks, and a pair of silicone gloves for creating various recipes.Dehydrator Machine can dehydrate a variety of vegetables, fruits, meats, flowers and other foods, and easily lock the minerals and vitamins in the food.

[Digital Control & 24H Timer]:Use the digital control panel to adjust the time from 30 minutes to 24 hours, with precise control in 30-minute increments. And the temperature can be precisely adjusted from 70℉ to 190℉.

[Safe to Use]:One minute before the timer is up, the automatic shutdown function will start immediately, and the cold air will be automatically blown to cool the machine. If the inside of the dehydrator is overheated, the overheat protection function will be activated. Note: the voltage is 120V 60Hz and the power is 1200W, only applicable to USA and Canada.

[Food Grade Stainless Steel]:Our jerky dehydrator is made of food-grade stainless steel and glass front door. Our meat dehydrator for jerky upgrade double row vents, greatly accelerate the water vapor discharge, food dehydrator efficiency improved greatly. Equipped with a rear-mounted drying fan and air flow circulation technology to promote even drying, monitor the dryer process easily with the transparent door window.

[Noiseless＜50dB]:Wait for food to dehydrate after setting time and temperature. The integrated horizontal airflow system drying evenly heats all the trays to ensure more even drying and noiseless operation.

[Easy to Clean]: Made with 304 food-grade stainless steel, the trays are safer, more durable, and dishwasher-safe. The removable trays and drip tray make cleaning a breeze, saving you time and effort.
[Satisfaction Service]: We offer a long warranty period for 1 years (from the date of purchase), if you encounter any problems, please feel free to contact our customer service.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I had an old dehydrator from The Galloping Gourmet (Yes, it still works) and it was time to get something that handled more product (volume/types) and had better temperature control.  I did my research and this is the one I chose.  I could not have been more than please with the decision.  It is big (love the square trays), comes with silicon mats, hooks and a rack to hold the hooks (thinking Biltong), holds its heat and is very quiet.  Big emphasis on how quiet it is because I was expecting this to make a lot more noise based on the size of the unit.  The one drawback is that the timer can only be set for 24 hours, and I have had to extend that a couple of times while using it.  Not a problem unless you forget - I still gave it a five-star rating but dinged the temperature control.

title: Trays are a bit too small.
content: I chose this because it is stainless steel.Love it. All stainless steel construction.  There are handles on the top.I made several jars of banana chips, no banana's you wish to dehydrate, and I bumped the heat up 5 points and about 6-8 hrs longer on top of what the recipe says. My goal was 1\18" per slice and I didn't want to see another banana for awhile, so I get my banana slicer in 3 days, I'm so excited. Oh and my banana taste crisp, so it WAS worth it especially as they have a 2-3 years shelf life. Yum.My first time trying this was dehydrating pink pineapple and making fruit leathers with strawberries, raspberries, blackberries, rambutan, and dragon fruit. I mixed some sugar and let them marinate overnight. In the morning I added some applesauce. Then I blitzed them in my high powered blender for a few minutes. I started on 135° for 6 hours. It needed a few more. So I checked it in 3 more hours and it was perfect. When I do it again I’ll add a bit more sugar.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023

Soon I'll be making fruit leathers and drying some cantaloupe.

title: worth each penny.
content: First off, this dehydrator is silent. I prepped a small batch of fruit first to see how long I should leave them in the dryer. I did 8 hours with just one shelf of apple slices. I love the design of the machine, and it comes with SO MANY shelves. After 8 hours, they are delicious, but I would prefer them a little more crispy. I will do another batch and leave for closer to 11 hours. The large fan in the back along with the space between the shelves positions the consistent air flow to enter the entire space. I plugged it in, wiped out the inside and the shelves, let it preheat for 10 minutes like it says, and we started. Machine is very easy to use and looks very professional. I’m happy with this purchase and looking forward to drying my peppers and herbs.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2024

title: Large and good quality!  I just made the best natural mango fruit roll up
content: UPDATE:  I finally got a chance to use this dehydrator and it is AMAZING!!!  I made a mango puree using frozen mango chunks and a tiny amount of sugar.  I didn't add any water because the mango chunks had enough water.  Once the mango was cooked through and soft, I squished it with a bean squisher (no blending needed), then smoothed the puree thinly on parchment paper and placed into the dehydrator.  using the manual for guidance, I set the temp for 140 deg F for 5 hours.  I left home and when I returned the next day, the dehydrator was turned off and the mango puree was dried into a PREFECT natural fruit roll up!  No preservatives or other nasty additives.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024

title: Perfect for large batches of jerky
content: This dehydrator is enormous on the inside but doesn't take up a lot of counter space. There are 12 shelves so you can dry a lot of food at once. There's a digital timer that sets in 30 minute increments. The temperature range is 70 to 190 so you can dry not only meats and veggies but delicate items such as herbs and flowers. Clean up is simple, remove the shelves and drip pan for washing and wipe out the inner cabinet. It comes with a lot of accessories like hooks and gloves, and recipes to get you started. I was surprised at how quiet it is, you don't hear anything. It has a safety feature that prevents overheating and a cool down function at the end of the drying cycle. It's heavy stainless steel and looks nice. I'm really glad I bought it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

This machine is also very quiet, i could barely hear it from the other side of the room, which is a huge plus!! The packaging it came in was also very nice and secure, they really made sure it wont come damaged.

title: High quality commercial food dehydrator!!
content: Bought this for my husband, who is an avid outdoorsman and loves to dehydrate various meats and some fruits. The variable temperature is awesome and performance is outstanding! Latch is sturdy and strong to keep door sealed well while dehydrating. Love that the noise level is extremely low, and the racks are easy to clean in between dehydrations. Racks are also easily removable if you do not want to use all 12 at one time. This is a well made product and came packaged professionally for protection. Very happy and impressed with this dehydrator!!
